name: --color-black
description: Absolute black color.

name: --color-white
description: Absolute white color.

name: --color-gray-50
description: Light mode background (sidebars, menus) and hover states.

name: --color-gray-100
description: Light mode secondary background and button hover states.

name: --color-gray-200
description: Light mode borders and disabled states.

name: --color-gray-300
description: Light mode dividers and borders.

name: --color-gray-400
description: Secondary text and icons.

name: --color-gray-500
description: Secondary text and placeholders.

name: --color-gray-600
description: Primary text in light mode.

name: --color-gray-700
description: Headings and important text in light mode.

name: --color-gray-800
description: Dark mode card backgrounds and button hover states.

name: --color-gray-850
description: Dark mode secondary background (menus, sidebars).

name: --color-gray-900
description: Dark mode primary background.

name: --color-gray-950
description: Dark mode deepest background (sidebars, modals).

name: --color-blue-100
description: Very light blue. Used for highlights and subtle backgrounds.

name: --color-blue-200
description: Light blue. Used for hover states and highlights.

name: --color-blue-300
description: Blue. Used for secondary actions and links.

name: --color-blue-400
description: Bright blue. Used for primary actions and highlights.

name: --color-blue-500
description: Strong blue. Used for primary buttons and links.

name: --color-blue-600
description: The primary brand color. Used for major UI elements.

name: --color-blue-700
description: Dark blue. Used for hover states on primary elements.

name: --color-blue-800
description: Very dark blue. Used for visited links or pressed states.

name: --color-blue-900
description: Almost navy blue. Used for text on light blue backgrounds.

name: --color-blue-950
description: The darkest blue. Used for deep backgrounds or text.
